title: Subjective Evaluation of Gesture Videos
instructions:
Please watch each video and rate the videos based on Four evaluation metrics,
         1. Realness: How realistic the video looks
         2. Diversity: How diverse does the gesture pattern presen
         3. Naturalness: Are speech and gesture synchronized in this video
         4. Overall: Overall quality of the video
     Please rate each video on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 is the lowest and 5 is the highest

captions:
1. Terrible, can't recognized as human gestures
                2. Poor, it is not real
                3. Fair, hard to judge
                4. Good, better, it looks real
                5. Excellent, it is what a human would do
